Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS

Title: Relates to requirements for explanatory statements regarding disposal of property
Summary: Requires explanatory statements regarding disposal of property to include the names of all beneficial owners.
LawCode: Amd ยง2897, Pub Auth L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public authorities law, in relation to requirements for explanatory statements regarding disposal of property
